meanings.definition: A bone in the lower leg that is located on the outer side of the tibia.
meanings.sent1: The fibulae helps support the lower leg.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her fibulae after running.
meanings.sent3: The fibulae decided to take a break from all the walking.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the fibulae in his leg.
meanings.sent5: The fibulae, like a sturdy pillar, held his weight effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A clasp or brooch used to fasten garments.
meanings.sent1: She used a fibulae to secure her shawl.
meanings.sent2: The antique fibulae added elegance to her dress.
meanings.sent3: The fibulae seemed to have a mind of its own, refusing to stay closed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the fibulae that held her outfit together.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the fibulae caught everyone's eye.
